description.p: Displays a pick-list of all columns in the currently active columnar List layout. Clicking items in the pick-list toggles a column's visibility.

argument.name: ele
argument.description: A pointer to the element that the pick-list should be shown below. Typically, if the method is on a button, *[js:ele]* will be the *[js:this]* object, which causes the pick-list to be displayed below the button.

argument.name: listName
argument.description: The name of the List control.

description.p: The maximum height of the pick-list. Use CSS units (in, px, em, etc. Percentages % are not supported.) For example: *[css:300px]*.
If the pick-list has more items than can fit within the allowed height, the pick-list will scroll.

discussion.p: The *[js:.listColumnSelector()]* method displays a pick-list for choosing the columns shown in a List control. The user can choose from te pick-list which columns to show and hide. The pick-list is shown relative to another control in the UX, specified as the *[js:ele]* parameter to the method.
